error_description: Omission fault in save method: addressRepository.save(addressEntity) missing after mapping; new addresses not persisted to database despite successful HTTP response (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious fault)
Omission fault in delete method: userRepository.delete(existingUserEntity) missing; users remain in database despite delete request (development phase, human-made, nonmalicious fault)

SQL injection vulnerability in getByUsername method: direct concatenation in native query 'SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = \'' + username + '\'' without parameterization (development flaw, high-probability exploitation fault)

Double password hashing in updateUserEntityFromUserRequest mapping expression: passwordEncoder.encode(passwordEncoder.encode(dto.password())), stores invalid hash preventing future logins (design fault in MapStruct configuration, human-made)

Incorrect pagination in listAll method: loads full user list with findAll(), ignores pageable offset/sort, returns full content with fake metadata (algorithmic fault, leads to erratic service for paged requests)
Missing @PreAuthorize on delete method: any authenticated user can delete any user ID without ownership or admin check (security design omission, intentional nonmalicious?)
Unsafe Optional.get() in getById method without orElseThrow: NoSuchElementException if address not found, inconsistent error handling vs other methods
Unsafe Optional.get() in update method: assumes address exists, throws unchecked exception if not found (pass 2: adversarial non-existent ID)
Unsafe Optional.get() in delete method: runtime exception on missing address (pass 3: propagation to halt failure mode)
Unsafe Optional.get() in checkLogin: throws NoSuchElementException for non-existent username, leaks existence vs password fail (timing/info disclosure risk)
Inconsistent @PostMapping(consumes="text/plain") for JSON DTO in create method: deserialization failure for standard JSON requests
Hardcoded absolute path in @Value default for logDirectoryPath: portability fault, fails in non-/home/dbe/... deployments
Unvalidated Base64 decode in createSecretKey: IllegalArgumentException if jwt.secret invalid (external input fault, operational)
